title: Ore No Oyome-San, Hentai Kamoshirenai
alternative_title: My Wife May Be a Pervert ; My Wife Might be a Hentai. ; Ore no Oyome-san, Hentai Kamoshirenai ; 俺のお嫁さん、変態かもしれない ; 我的妻子似乎是个变态
status: My Wife May Be a Pervert ; My Wife Might be a Hentai. ; Ore no Oyome-san, Hentai Kamoshirenai ; 俺のお嫁さん、変態かもしれない ; 我的妻子似乎是个变态
description:
Description :
        Hiroki Shinto is married to his childhood friend, Suzuka Mita for a logical reason rather than love. Since it's not a love marriage, the relationship is supposed to remain the same even after they become husband and wife....... However, "Oh, this is what guys smell like?" Once they move in together, Suzuka's true nature is revealed! He begins a life of being loved by a perverted wife!
